programme.title: Fourth Dimension
programme.desc: Fourth of July in Montana – Flathead Lake is where the party is at. But with the heat tempers flare and the free flowing alcohol combines to make a dangerous situation.

programme.title: ATV Accidents
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Survival Science S1 - "ATV Accidents"
programme.desc: ATVs have allowed us to penetrate the wilderness like never before. But they’ve also made the backcountry a bit more dangerous. Laura and Nick rig up some dramatic, high-speed tests to see how accidents happen and what you can do to protect yourself.

programme.title: Gran Canaria - Part One
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Hunting Fish S1 - "Gran Canaria - Part One"
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to locate a rare Mirror Carp in stunning Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Gran Canaria - Part Two
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Hunting Fish S1 - "Gran Canaria - Part Two"
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to fish wild Tuna in stunning Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Edge of the Earth
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Man Eats Wild S3 - "Edge of the Earth"
programme.desc: Go as far north as you can and once youre there go a little further. Mario finds himself in one of the most remote parts of the world exploring an unknown landscape. Theres Reindeer, arctic char but will he come home with the food his looking for?

programme.title: Silver Kings
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Silver Kings"
programme.desc: The group of iconic anglers reunite for a week of fishing and camaraderie in Belize. Bill Klyn and Tom McGuane fish for snook, Lori-Ann Murphy and Zach Gilford go after bonefish and Michael Keaton and Tom Brokaw pursue permit and tarpon.

programme.title: Grey Ghosts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Grey Ghosts"
programme.desc: The team of anglers cast into the flats off the coast of Belize in pursuit of bonefish. Tom Brokaw and Bill Klyn casts from a boat, McGuane and Yvon Chouninard try their luck wading and Michael Keaton and Lori-Ann Murphy use both methods.

programme.title: Hardcore Hapuka
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Hardcore Hapuka"
programme.desc: We return to Fiordland in the hope of going one step better in slotting a hapuka on a spear, but the presence of Bluefin Tuna off the coast, and Wapiti Bulls on the slip faces proves a tempting distraction from the task at hand!

programme.title: Scoreless
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S1 - "Scoreless"
programme.desc: Using a unique method to crack a safe, Nick Wells (Robert De Niro) uses a blowtorch to cut through a safe, fill it with water, and blow the door off using a small explosive device.

programme.title: Ready to race
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "Ready to race"
programme.desc: The Flying Kestrel team heads back to the 2 mile long runway at Elvington, where last year Jon Webster crashed the car. He drives it in anger for the first time since that fateful day but have they done enough?

programme.title: Mini
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Mini"
programme.desc: Mat Watson travels Europe on the trail of a very special 1960s Mini.

programme.title: Mercedes SL
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Mercedes SL"
programme.desc: Mat Watson tracks down one of the most desirable convertibles on the planet. The Mercedes SL Pagoda.

programme.title: American Car
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Find Me A Classic S1 - "American Car"
programme.desc: Mat Watson sets off to seek out a slice of Americana. A classic car from the USA.

programme.title: Monster Bass in Shallow Grass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Hunt for Monster Bass S1 - "Monster Bass in Shallow Grass"
programme.desc: Host Ott DeFoe hunts down double-digit Largemouth Bass in this shallow lake full of grass.

programme.title: The Lodge At Palisades Creek (Idaho)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E10 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "The Lodge At Palisades Creek (Idaho)"
programme.desc: This region of Idaho has become famed for the trout fishing and variety of locations to do it. Mark Melnyk explores this area with one of the top guides.

programme.title: Scott Lake Lodge (Saskatchewan)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E11 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Scott Lake Lodge (Saskatchewan)"
programme.desc: Phil Rowley takes a floatplane to the far north of Saskatchewan to catch massive Northern Pike on a fly. He is the guest of Scott Lake Lodge.

programme.title: Tuckamore Lodge (Newfoundland)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E12 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Tuckamore Lodge (Newfoundland)"
programme.desc: Colin McKeown visits one of the prettiest parts of Newfoundland to salmon fish and also view whales, caribou and other wildlife.

programme.title: Antarctica
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Antarctica"
programme.desc: Jonathan caps off the season with an expedition into the spirit of isolation; a journey that takes him from Arunchal pradesh, India, to Dolomites in Italy, to all the way down in Antarctica

programme.title: Andy Soucek - Bentley Continental
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Andy Soucek - Bentley Continental"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Andy Soucek competing in the Bentley Continental at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race held at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Ahmad Al Harthy - Aston Martin Vantage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Ahmad Al Harthy - Aston Martin Vantage"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Ahmad Al Harthy competing in the Aston Martin Vantage at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Albert Costa - Lexus RC F
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Albert Costa - Lexus RC F"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Alberto Costa competing in the Lexus RC F at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race held at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Germany / England
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Epic Exploring S1 - "Germany / England"
programme.desc: Josh and Cody are diving into the underworld. This time, Josh explores the abandoned German mining industry, including an encounter with a Police squad, and in England, Cody explores an old Soviet submarine in the English Medway river.

programme.title: U.S.A. / Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Epic Exploring S1 - "U.S.A. / Cyprus"
programme.desc: Cody encounters wild animals and thrilling attractions in abandoned Six Flags, New Orleans. Meanwhile, Josh is in Cyprus where the UN peace keeping force allows him to explore the abandoned Nicosia International Airport and the UN bufferzone.

programme.title: Armenia / Greece
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Epic Exploring S1 - "Armenia / Greece"
programme.desc: Together with rooftopper Elaina Hammeken, Josh explores an incredible radio telescope from the Soviet era in Armenia while Cody experiences an astonishing trip through the Greek mining industry of Ptolemaida with his travel companion, Elvis Brauer.

programme.title: Morocco
programme.desc: A German MTB legend decides to build a van and travel all the way down to Morocco to explore and ride the great Atlas mountains.

programme.title: Spain
programme.desc: We meet with a Spanish MTB pro rider who decided to create his own company in order to build the most exclusive and unique carbon bikes.

programme.title: Bali
programme.desc: We travel to Bali - Indonesia to meet an MTB pro rider who decided to start a new life dividing his time between surfing and riding active volcanos.

programme.title: On Thin Ice
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "On Thin Ice"
programme.desc: On a rare day off, Josiah and his friends white water raft where few have gone before - on top of the massive Knik Glacier.

programme.title: Mischelle Hileman
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Fight to Survive S1 - "Mischelle Hileman"
programme.desc: This week, Mischelle Hileman finds herself deep in the Oregon wilderness on an elk hunt when she gets lost, injured, and on the brink of death.

programme.title: The Rick Collins Story
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Fight to Survive S1 - "The Rick Collins Story"
programme.desc: This week on Trip Gone Bad, a father and son set out on a cliff side sheep hunt, but one slip could mean life or death in this remote and unforgiving area.

programme.title: Leming Bear Attack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Fight to Survive S1 - "Leming Bear Attack"
programme.desc: This week, well learn the harrowing tale of a fathers desperate attempt to save his sons life from a grizzly bear attack while out hunting together.

programme.title: Scott Lake Lodge (Saskatchewan)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E11 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Scott Lake Lodge (Saskatchewan)"
programme.desc: Phil Rowley takes a floatplane to the far north of Saskatchewan to catch massive Northern Pike on a fly. He is the guest of Scott Lake Lodge.

programme.title: Tuckamore Lodge (Newfoundland)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E12 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Tuckamore Lodge (Newfoundland)"
programme.desc: Colin McKeown visits one of the prettiest parts of Newfoundland to salmon fish and also view whales, caribou and other wildlife.

programme.title: Antarctica
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Antarctica"
programme.desc: Jonathan caps off the season with an expedition into the spirit of isolation; a journey that takes him from Arunchal pradesh, India, to Dolomites in Italy, to all the way down in Antarctica

programme.title: Prayer Point
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Prayer Point"
programme.desc: On day three at "Prayer Point", Casey faces another opportunity, inconveniently timed. While answering natures call, a bull respondes to cow calls from camp, appearing across the river.

programme.title: Night Stalkers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Night Stalkers"
programme.desc: Exhausted and famished, the brothers persist downstream, barely mustering energy to set camp. They find abundant signs of moose and favorable terrain for their habitat.

programme.title: Exploration Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Exploration Camp"
programme.desc: Days pass, moose elusive since Day 11. Restless nights with lurking creatures. They find an abandoned trappers cabin, home to a huge grizzly.

programme.title: Day 1
programme.desc: Kevin travels to Switzerland and has 24 hours to go from Zurich to the Swiss mountains, while Jalou finds an exciting way to go from Cannes to Corsica.

programme.title: Day 2
programme.desc: Jalou has 24 hours to get from Barcelona to Tarragona where she conquers the Catalonian mountains with her mountain bike. Kevin tries to beat her in Slovenia.

programme.title: NEW BEGINNINGS IN AUTUMN
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Bottom Feeders S1 - "NEW BEGINNINGS IN AUTUMN"
programme.desc: As the season changes from summer to fall, change is also in store for our commercial fishermen. One man is just starting out, one is barely getting by, and one is looking to start over.

programme.title: WORLDS COLLIDE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Bottom Feeders S1 - "WORLDS COLLIDE"
programme.desc: The rough season is starting to wear on commercial fishermen. For some, hard feelings are boiling to the surface and others turn imagination into money.

programme.title: Street Artist
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Breaking the Day S1 - "Street Artist"
programme.desc: Alex Yanes uses resin, acrylic, wood, and enamel to create 3D works that redefine pop art.

programme.title: Behind The Shed
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Wardens S5 - "Behind The Shed"
programme.desc: When the game ranges are opened up for Antler Shed Hunting its all hands on deck for the Montana Game Wardens. Reports of Bears, Mountain Lions and lost hunters keep the wardens busy.

programme.title: Fun in The Sun
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 Wardens S5 - "Fun in The Sun"
programme.desc: When Jet skies get too close to boats things can turn dangerous. And Warden Bryan Golie questions an angler in search for the truth.

programme.title: Backpacking Estes Park, Colorado
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Epic Trails S3 - "Backpacking Estes Park, Colorado"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson discovers the amazing hiking and climbing adventures to be had in the cool, mountain-town known as Estes Park, Colorado.

programme.title: Backpacking Quebec – Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Epic Trails S3 - "Backpacking Quebec – Part 1"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson explores epic coastal hiking routes of Gaspesie and the incredible nighttime wilderness adventures in the Eastern Township of Quebec.

programme.title: The Gift of Knowledge
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Knowledge"
programme.desc: On the way to Machu Pichu Leon meets a kindhearted fisherman. In Urubamba a visit to a friend and her school leaves him awestruck.

programme.title: The Gift of Travel
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Travel"
programme.desc: Leon crosses Lake Titicaca heading to Bolivia as Kindness 2 breaks down again! A street musician reconnects him with his passion for travel.

programme.title: Alpine Ghosts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Alpine Ghosts"
programme.desc: Mario takes on the unforgiving alpine mountains of the South Island of New Zealand in a grueling fallow deer hunt with his bow just at the end of the rut and cooks an impressive masterpiece venison pie dish on the same antler of the deer he harvests.

programme.title: Deadly Outback
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Deadly Outback"
programme.desc: We are in the outback of Australia. It’s the Monsoon season. Mario links up with longtime friend in search of a wild Buffalo, he attempts to cook an amazing South American inspired dish in the middle of nowhere.

programme.title: Long Days, Cold Nights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Dropped S1 - "Long Days, Cold Nights"
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers awaken to a frozen tundra. With over 8 miles to cover and no oars, the brothers are forced to trudge their way through shallow water and barren earth as they head downstream in search of they second cache.

programme.title: Choke Point
programme.desc: The terrain begins to change as the Keefer brothers are forced to pick their way downstream. The landscape tightens it’s grip and funnels the brothers to a geographic choke point where both predator and prey gather.

programme.title: Bone-Weary
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers take shelter in a small pine outcropping as a winter storm sets siege to the river. Forced to wait out the arctic blast, the brothers try and retain what little energy they have left.

programme.title: Pitt Island Expedition
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Pitt Island Expedition"
programme.desc: Following a ridiculous sequence of events in Fiordland, the team saddle up and head for the hapuka haven of the Chatham Islands, where they spend a few days diving the spectacular and remote Pitt Island.

programme.title: Terry Vs Gorn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S1 - "Terry Vs Gorn"
programme.desc: Captain James T Kirk’s battle with the Gorn alien is one of the most popular episodes from the original series. He defeats the Gorn by creating gunpowder from the base elements found on the planet.

programme.title: Fireside Fortune
programme.desc: Using up the last of their energy, the Keefer brothers make their way down stream in search of their next supply cache. The tide turns as they finally make their way out of the open tundra and into the heart of moose country.

programme.title: Now or Never
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dropped S1 - "Now or Never"
programme.desc: With lifted spirits, the Keefer brothers set out to spot and stalk a herd of caribou near by, but closing in proves more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Cache Out
programme.desc: With red meat, the Keefer brothers are finally able to replenish their depleted energy, but they arent the only ones looking to survive the winter in the Alaskan wilderness.

programme.title: Bearing Down
programme.desc: The harsh reality of winter sets in, and the Keefer brothers are forced to sleep with one eye open as a grizzly patrols the area around their camp.

programme.title: Arviat, Nunavut, Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Arviat, Nunavut, Canada"
programme.desc: Heading to the far north into the Arctic to learn about the Inuit’s traditional culture and incredible way of life, the brothers accompany an elder and young hunter on a 200-mile skidoo hunt across the barren land and frozen sea ice.

programme.title: Kushtia, Bangladesh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Kushtia, Bangladesh"
programme.desc: The brothers traverse the country’s interconnecting network of waterways by ferryboat. From shrimp baron, to peasant fishermen, lofty temple ruins to anonymous chai wallahs, they make their way to Kushtia, home to the shrine of Guru Lalone Shaw.

programme.title: Kingdom of Mustang, Nepal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Kingdom of Mustang, Nepal"
programme.desc: Securing special visas, the brothers get 10 ponies and 6 porters and undertake a stunning, but difficult 13-day pony trek over the Himalayas to the valley of Mustang where they will try to have a sitting with the king.

programme.title: Western Florida Monster Bass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Hunt for Monster Bass S1 - "Western Florida Monster Bass"
programme.desc: Host Ott DeFoe hunts down double-digit Largemouth Bass in this forgotten lake in western Florida.

programme.title: Back-alley Bass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Hunt for Monster Bass S1 - "Back-alley Bass"
programme.desc: Host Ott DeFoe hunts down double-digit Largemouth Bass in the alleyways and cuts of these northern Florida waters.

programme.title: Monster Bass in Lost Waters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 The Hunt for Monster Bass S1 - "Monster Bass in Lost Waters"
programme.desc: Host Ott DeFoe hunts down double-digit Largemouth Bass in waters that havent been fished in decades.

programme.title: Glacier
programme.desc: Mike Wilson plans the next steps of his journey around Iceland – to take on the biggest glacier in all of Europe and head for the East Fjords.

programme.title: Stranded
programme.desc: Mike Wilson is stranded on the Vatnajökull glacier. If his team can help get him off the ice, the East Fjords are calling.

programme.title: The Troll Peninsula
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Extreme Iceland S1 - "The Troll Peninsula"
programme.desc: Mike Wilson is on the final stretch of his journey, featuring Viking Heliskiing on the Troll Peninsula and white-water rafting in the West Fjords.

programme.title: U.S.A. / Belgium
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Epic Exploring S1 - "U.S.A. / Belgium"
programme.desc: While Cody explores lost industries in the ‘ugliest’ city in the world with freerunner Abudi Alsagoff, Josh, together with his old neighborhood friend John Yurei, is in the famous American prison Joliet, where prisoners build their own cells.

programme.title: Goli Otok Prison Island – Croatia
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Ghost Chasers S2 - "Goli Otok Prison Island – Croatia"
programme.desc: Some prisoners are never released. Does Cody find the forever imprisoned on a small island known as the ‘Croatian Alcatraz’?

programme.title: The Record
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "The Record"
programme.desc: Driver Jon Webster is strapped in and ready to push the Flying Kestrel to its limits.The Kestrel team must overcome multiple problems on the day to stand any chance of topping the time sheets and can Jon keep the kestrel on track and break the record

programme.title: Fireside Fortune
programme.desc: Using up the last of their energy, the Keefer brothers make their way down stream in search of their next supply cache. The tide turns as they finally make their way out of the open tundra and into the heart of moose country.

programme.title: Now or Never
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dropped S1 - "Now or Never"
programme.desc: With lifted spirits, the Keefer brothers set out to spot and stalk a herd of caribou near by, but closing in proves more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Cache Out
programme.desc: With red meat, the Keefer brothers are finally able to replenish their depleted energy, but they arent the only ones looking to survive the winter in the Alaskan wilderness.

programme.title: Bearing Down
programme.desc: The harsh reality of winter sets in, and the Keefer brothers are forced to sleep with one eye open as a grizzly patrols the area around their camp.

programme.title: Season Recap
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Fight to Survive S1 - "Season Recap"
programme.desc: This week, we take a look back at our seasons survival stories with a more in-depth look with the help of former Army Special Forces soldier, Terry Schappert.

programme.title: After The Fall
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Fight to Survive S2 - "After The Fall"
programme.desc: A rock-climbing disaster hurtles climber Craig DeMartino 100 feet down a granite cliff. A shattered heap of broken bones, Craig clings to life. In a split second, Craig’s life becomes an inspiring fight to survive.

programme.title: A Rivers Grasp
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Fight to Survive S2 - "A Rivers Grasp"
programme.desc: In an isolated mountain river, Fisherman Dean Ririe becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder in water up to his neck. In icy waters that should kill a man, Dean fights for his life miles from help.

programme.title: “I’m a Ragtop Man!”
programme.sub-title: S16 : E02 Graveyard Carz S16 - "“I’m a Ragtop Man!”"
programme.desc: Mark assists Justin in buttoning up the rear end details of the 1970 roadrunner convertible.

programme.title: Mark’s Little Demon
programme.sub-title: S16 : E03 Graveyard Carz S16 - "Mark’s Little Demon"
programme.desc: The famous 1971 Mr. Norm’s Dodge Demon, 340 6-pack is cruising through the shop.

programme.title: A Hunk of Burning Love
programme.sub-title: S16 : E04 Graveyard Carz S16 - "A Hunk of Burning Love"
programme.desc: What do you get when you cross a bird with a fish? The one and only Phoenix ‘Cuda!

programme.title: South Korea
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Chasing the Sun S2 - "South Korea"
programme.desc: Explore a place where its illegal to be a tattoo artist and the people in a rapidly changing culture. A place where a GPS limitations mean the possibilities to get lost in music and art are endless.

programme.title: Ancient forests of Tsitsikamma
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Ancient forests of Tsitsikamma"
programme.desc: Xander takes full advantage of the opportunities given to him by experiencing all that Tsitsikamma has to offer, whether that be bungee jumping, quad biking, or visiting a 60’s diner.

programme.title: The Animals of Oudtshoorn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Animals of Oudtshoorn"
programme.desc: Xander starts his day by receiving a surprising phone call from Adam before heading to Chandelier Game Lodge to visit Africa’s most exquisite animals.

programme.title: South Korea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel Quest S1 - "South Korea"
programme.desc: Follow Bill as he tours a medieval aristocrats massive fortress that mirrors the Forbidden City. From giant burial mounds, to new Olympic sites, to still moving food, join Bill as he finds the soul of this modern ancient country.

programme.title: Fiji
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Travels with the Bondi Vet S3 - "Fiji"
programme.desc: Chris joins a rugby game in Fiji where kids are the stars, tests himself against the fittest men and women in the land of the body beautiful, has his heart stolen by a giant steer, and meets some cute Australian natives.

programme.title: Arviat, Nunavut, Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Arviat, Nunavut, Canada"
programme.desc: Heading to the far north into the Arctic to learn about the Inuit’s traditional culture and incredible way of life, the brothers accompany an elder and young hunter on a 200-mile skidoo hunt across the barren land and frozen sea ice.

programme.title: Inside Ferrari
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Car and Country Quest - 30 Min Version S1 - "Inside Ferrari"
programme.desc: The trio are joined by Mathias Lauda, son of F1 Legend Niki Lauda, at Ferrari’s Maranello HQ. From factory tours showcasing Ferrari’s craftsmanship to dining in Ferrari’s historic restaurant, the team immerses in Ferrari’s legacy.

programme.title: Inside Ferrari 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Car and Country Quest - 30 Min Version S1 - "Inside Ferrari 2"
programme.desc: Freddie leads an exclusive Ferrari tour, as they explore Ferrari’s design centre, visit its museum, and honour F1 champions. A friendly race in the Ferrari simulator and a scenic drive in new Ferraris close their Italian adventure beautifully.

programme.title: Seychelles
programme.desc: Not just one glorious tropical island paradise, but 2! Sashi heads to the best resort in Maldives, Soneva Jani to get a taste of their brand new culinary experience. Then he heads to East Africa to experience the best of Seychelles! This is a Max Foodie adventure unlike any other!

programme.title: Maldives / Soneva Jani
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Maldives / Soneva Jani"
programme.desc: Not just one glorious tropical island paradise, but 2! Sashi heads to the best resort in Maldives, Soneva Jani to get a taste of their brand new culinary experience. Then he heads to East Africa to experience the best of Seychelles! This is a Max Foodie adventure unlike any other!

programme.title: Astypalia and Pserimos
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Astypalia and Pserimos"
programme.desc: First stop in series three is Astypalia, which is a couple of hours cruising to the west of Kos. I It’s the western-most island of the group and is shaped like a butterfly, and beautiful like one too!

programme.title: Kalymnos
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Kalymnos"
programme.desc: In this episode, I’ve arrived on the island of Kalymnos. It’s one of the biggest islands in the Dodecanese, famed for its rock climbing.

programme.title: Quantum Leaps in Rishikesh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Road to Dharma S1 - "Quantum Leaps in Rishikesh"
programme.desc: The team, led by Anand, prepare for their motorcycle adventure to the four sacred peaks. The first practice ride is in the birthplace of yoga, but monsoons are destroying the environment, Fred seems a liability and Ryans seizures could be an issue.

programme.title: Santorini
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Running the World S1 - "Santorini"
programme.desc: A challenge to race each other and a labyrinth of narrow streets and hidden passages to navigate will make this one of the trickiest challenges.

programme.title: Best of ep. 1 to 5
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Running the World S1 - "Best of ep. 1 to 5"
programme.desc: Parkour athletes Max and Benj Cave look back over their travels so far and discuss the best places for practising parkour.

programme.title: Lisbon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Running the World S1 - "Lisbon"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave undertake a run where they attempt to escape from Lisbon castle without using any conventional exit routes.

programme.title: Pe’ahi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Pe’ahi"
programme.desc: Will Skudin and Keali’i Mamala deal with the trials and tribulations of life as traveling big wave surfers.

programme.title: Mavericks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Mavericks"
programme.desc: Big wave surfing’s elite break routines and converge to ride an unforgettable swell at Mavericks.

programme.title: The Eddie
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "The Eddie"
programme.desc: The world’s elite big wave surfers revel in the biggest most powerful Waimea Bay surf conditions to ever grace the Eddie Aikau Contest.

programme.title: Karabezi Houseboat Cruiser
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Karabezi Houseboat Cruiser"
programme.desc: Kristina travels back to Zimbabwe’s stunning lake Kariba. This time she’s touring the area on the luxurious Karabezi Houseboat Cruiser. Joined by fishing experts, Craig and Mark, she attempts to catch the notorious tiger fish.

programme.title: Rhino Safari Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Rhino Safari Camp"
programme.desc: Hosted by Rhino Safari Camp, the epic safari continues in the Matusadona National Park where Kristina is guided by Steve. They explore the lakeshore, encounter the local hungry pride and Marula, the resident elephant, makes a lunchtime appearance.

programme.title: Chilo Gorge Safari Lodge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Chilo Gorge Safari Lodge"
programme.desc: Kristina travels to Gonarezhou National Park in the South-East of Zimbabwe. Thomas, her guide, takes her to the breath-taking Chilojo cliffs, tracks an impressive buffalo herd and keeps his cool as they experience heart-stopping elephant charges.

programme.title: Texas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 My Van Life S1 - "Texas"
programme.desc: A colourful graffiti artist in Austin shares her story of loss with Lisa and gives her a tarot reading. We travel to rural Texas to overnight with Jupiter: an outspoken, non-binary person of colour, living in their vintage RV while studying law.

programme.title: Arizona
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 My Van Life S1 - "Arizona"
programme.desc: Lisa spontaneously joins a sober dance party on a mountain top in Sedona, and meets spiritual Van Lifers who have dramatically changed their entire existence, including former NFL player Joe Hawley, and a transformative breathwork practitioner.

programme.title: Utah
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 My Van Life S1 - "Utah"
programme.desc: Lisa heads to Utah, the ultimate playground for Van Life adrenaline junkies: aka Dirt Bags. Base jumper Derrick shows that by confronting death, it helps us appreciate life. We meet a solo female traveler who challenges Lisa by taking her bouldering.

programme.title: Swakopmund
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 A Simple Path S1 - "Swakopmund"
programme.desc: Amidst the vast desert, we discover handmade leather shoes, the yellow bus on the beach, Kalahari truffles, the power of gemstones, keepers of the desert elephants and a skate ramp in the middle of the dunes.

programme.title: Nairobi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 A Simple Path S1 - "Nairobi"
programme.desc: Uhuru Park is the nucleus for skateboarders in Gaborone. We meet street Keedz turning their lives around, a local animator, the producer of Sighkick Mag and learn how to make homemade trucks and sign language at Pallet Cafe.

programme.title: Jakarta
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 A Simple Path S2 - "Jakarta"
programme.desc: Jakarta, urban meets jungle. The yellow brick road, shiny shoes at Survive Skate shop, 24/7 under the bridge. Road trip to Bandung, a mosque session, Nasi Padang Every Day, Bhang records, live with Sigit, motion graphics and self-expression.

programme.title: A Newly-Wed Recipe for Disaster
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Love On The Rocks S1 - "A Newly-Wed Recipe for Disaster"
programme.desc: Jason loves mountain biking. Tayler prefers to read a book. Jason is up for any adventure tossed at him. Tayler likes to be a bit more prepared. Will the adventures that await in Arkansas leave the couple questioning if they have anything in common?

programme.title: Theodoras Room
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Theodoras Room"
programme.desc: Tayler and Jason travel to Eureka Springs, AR, a town with a rich history and home to one of the most haunted hotels in America, The Crescent. Jason convinces Tayler to stay one night, but will that stay lead to a night they dont want to remember?

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: Punk rocker Jon-Mikal formed his band The Idiot Kids as a way to deal with his sexuality. After coming out to his family at 21, he uses writing and his stage performance as a form of therapy.

programme.title: Moldova
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Moldova"
programme.desc: Jonathan enters Europe’s poorest country with a purpose: Enter the little know breakaway Soviet Republic of Transnistria with a “package.” for a friend. It’s a journey that will begin with urban exploration in the decay of Bucharest and end with close calls with secret police in Tiraspol.

programme.title: Calcutta: City of Living History
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Journeys in India S2 - "Calcutta: City of Living History"
programme.desc: There is no city in India that is more British than Calcutta. The former capital of British India, Calcutta has gardens, buildings and museums to prove it. Throw away any ideas you have of this giant city and discover the treasures it holds.

programme.title: South India: Land of Superlatives
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Journeys in India S2 - "South India: Land of Superlatives"
programme.desc: Two of the greatest ancient monuments in the world are in South India—Hampi and Konark. These two wonders of the world were lost to the west, but now are at the top of many bucket lists.

programme.title: Chef Anthony Lamas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Back Home S1 - "Chef Anthony Lamas"
programme.desc: Chef Anthony Lamas returns home to Mexico to explore the thriving culinary scene in Oaxaca and rediscover his family roots. Join Anthony as he tastes the finest foods, meets his most talented peers, and gets a little drunk on mezca.

programme.title: Robert Rodriguez
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Back Home S1 - "Robert Rodriguez"
programme.desc: Award-winning film director Robert Rodriguez travels to Morelia to reconnect with the country that gave birth to his first film ever, "El Mariachi".

programme.title: Alisa Valdes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Back Home S1 - "Alisa Valdes"
programme.desc: Author Alisa Valdes travels to Havana, Cuba to visit the place where her father was born and raised. Join her on her journey as she discovers the challenges of living as an author and artist in Communist Cuba.

programme.title: The Langeberg Mountains
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Langeberg Mountains"
programme.desc: The South African crew travels to the Langeberg Mountains for a luxurious day of relaxation and exploration while Adam searches for wildlife on his makeshift Canadian safari.

programme.title: Royalty in Robertson
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Royalty in Robertson"
programme.desc: While Xander and his team experience the lush, green valleys and incredible vineyards in Robertson, Adam learns a tough lesson about not only surviving, but thriving.

programme.title: Historical Swellendam
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Historical Swellendam"
programme.desc: While Xavier works with a professional South African stunt performer to go mountain biking and kayaking, Adam endeavors to complete a stunt of his own.

programme.title: End of Stories - A Trechorous Night
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Road to Dharma S1 - "End of Stories - A Trechorous Night"
programme.desc: Jen and Jeff’s dream is to save their marriage on this journey, but it’s clear they are in different mindsets from the beginning. We are reminded that Anand had a prophecy of death and his teachers and life adventures helped guide him to freedom.

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Streets S1 - "New York"
programme.desc: Rapper Shiniqua, aka Pretty Little Monster, juggles motherhood while trying to avoid the trappings of Instagram fame. Her passion is writing rap lyrics and always tries to keep it real.

programme.title: Moldova
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Moldova"
programme.desc: Jonathan enters Europe’s poorest country with a purpose: Enter the little know breakaway Soviet Republic of Transnistria with a “package.” for a friend. It’s a journey that will begin with urban exploration in the decay of Bucharest and end with close calls with secret police in Tiraspol.

programme.title: Calcutta: City of Living History
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Journeys in India S2 - "Calcutta: City of Living History"
programme.desc: There is no city in India that is more British than Calcutta. The former capital of British India, Calcutta has gardens, buildings and museums to prove it. Throw away any ideas you have of this giant city and discover the treasures it holds.

programme.title: South India: Land of Superlatives
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Journeys in India S2 - "South India: Land of Superlatives"
programme.desc: Two of the greatest ancient monuments in the world are in South India—Hampi and Konark. These two wonders of the world were lost to the west, but now are at the top of many bucket lists.

programme.title: Wilmington, Delaware
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Travels with Darley S1 - "Wilmington, Delaware"
programme.desc: From Delaware’s first settler to the du Pont mansions and a historic fort, Darley discovers American history in and around Wilmington. She shares where to get great local beer and dine at a James Beard Award-nominated restaurant.

programme.title: Day 2
programme.desc: Jalou has 24 hours to get from Barcelona to Tarragona where she conquers the Catalonian mountains with her mountain bike. Kevin tries to beat her in Slovenia.

programme.title: Day 3
programme.desc: Kevin leaves civilization behind in Suriname, while thousands of kilometers away, Jalou has to go literally through the trees in an Australian forest.

programme.title: JAMAICA and MAURITIUS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Travel in Style S1 - "JAMAICA and MAURITIUS"
programme.desc: Jamaica, the home of reggae and rum. A quick zoom across to the Indian Ocean we find Mauritius.

programme.title: LONDON and SYDNEY
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Travel in Style S1 - "LONDON and SYDNEY"
programme.desc: London - one of the most famous and historic cities in the world. Sydney - the most expensive city in Australia but dont let that put you off!

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Wonders Of... S2 - "Hong Kong"
programme.desc: On Wonders of Hong Kong, Ashley will show you that there’s something to keep you busy in this amazing city. With Chinese influence in every direction, Ashley takes you on a walk through the history that can still be seen today.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Streets S1 - "Las Vegas"
programme.desc: Las Vegas is home to a hot rod car club community which over the decades has been connected to the rise of rockabilly music. Through Luke Metz and his band, Shanda and The Howlers, we learn how this bond between fashion, music and cars was created.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent S4 - "Above and Beyond"
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She’s a physical therapist and she’s a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day.

programme.title: Energized
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent S4 - "Energized"
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They’re looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Kampong Life
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Must Eat! Must See! Must Do! - Singapore S2 - "Kampong Life"
programme.desc: For a taste of kampong life in Singapore, hitch a ride on a bumboat to Pulau Ubin and walk around Chek Jawa, a 100 hectare wetlands with six interdependent ecosystems. As a mid-morning snack, have a bowl of silky smooth beancurd.

programme.title: MINT Museum of Toys
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Must Eat! Must See! Must Do! - Singapore S2 - "MINT Museum of Toys"
programme.desc: Visit the MINT Museum of Toys for a walk down nostalgia as you browse its collection of 50,000 items, which are valued at SP$5m, before traveling down to Chinatown for a rejuvenating crystal

programme.title: House of Kung Fu
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Must Eat! Must See! Must Do! - Singapore S2 - "House of Kung Fu"
programme.desc: Schedule an appointment with a traditional Chinese herbalist before popping by House of Kung Fu to get some souvenirs. Now, there is no stopping you from gobbling down some golf-ball sized pineapple tarts and flavoured bean curd tarts.

programme.title: Bling
programme.desc: From the hip-hop culture in Los Angeles to the tribal villages of Kenya, Kyle Ng explores the global appeal of shiny jewellery, aka ‘bling’.

programme.title: Sacred Threads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Social Fabric S1 - "Sacred Threads"
programme.desc: Along with musician Johnny P, Kyle heads to Brooklyn Circus to get dressed up for church. He sees how Islamic threads are being modernised at 5ive Pillars, and explores the history of the Sikh turban.

programme.title: Camo
programme.desc: Kyle Ng learns the tactical application of camo from a British Special Forces sniper, gets the perfect streetwear piece for his next skate session and challenges Mark McNairy in a paintball war.

programme.title: Telendos
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Telendos"
programme.desc: In this episode I’m covering every inch of the tiny island of Telendos. It’s only 600 meters from Kalymnos, but has a personality of its own, with great hiking and a fantastic dive site.

programme.title: Lipsi
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Lipsi"
programme.desc: In this episode I’m headed for Lipsi, a peaceful little gem that’s well and truly off the mainstream tourist radar. Here I’ll be getting my hands dirty as I learn about the island’s unique history.

programme.title: Patmos
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Patmos"
programme.desc: This episode sees me on the island of Patmos, one of the most important locations in the Christian world. It’s a place of pilgrimage for thousands of people from across the planet.

programme.title: Liguria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Finding Little Italy S1 - "Liguria"
programme.desc: Liguria is more than just a glamorous stretch of Riviera coastline. Giorgio the chef cooks for us and we pop into a local sweet shop; then further still to the towers of Albenga and the postcard views of Cervo.

programme.title: Toscana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Finding Little Italy S1 - "Toscana"
programme.desc: In this episode we will drive through the UNESCO-protected Val d’Orcia to find a different Tuscany. In lieu of Chianti we will visit the eco-friendly Salcheto winery in the area’s great Montepulciano region.

programme.title: Umbria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Finding Little Italy S1 - "Umbria"
programme.desc: In this episode we shall have a brief stop at the tallest man-made waterfall in Europe before exploring some of the area’s towns. Orvieto, with its medieval centre and underground Etruscan ruins sets the stage.

programme.title: Balinese kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 A Taste of Travel S2 - "Balinese kitchen"
programme.desc: David gets busy in a Balinese kitchen and Alana meets a giant Chinese local

programme.title: Shanghai
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 A Taste of Travel S2 - "Shanghai"
programme.desc: Alana crashes into Shanghai and Scotty has a whale of a time in Hervey Bay.

programme.title: Maitland
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 A Taste of Travel S2 - "Maitland"
programme.desc: Alana stumbles upon the secret of eternal youth and Scotty goes under lock and key in Maitland

programme.title: Family Home
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent S5 - "Family Home"
programme.desc: Vipin Kakkars a successful businessman and his family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the GTA. Real Estate Agents Debbie Domingues and Mike Donia are challenged to find the perfect home that caters everyones needs.

programme.title: House of Dreams
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent S5 - "House of Dreams"
programme.desc: Phil and Claire, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore. Mortgage Broker, Paul Meredith advises in the investment options for the couple, as well as possibilities for amortgage.

programme.title: Dive into Marbella
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Dive into Marbella"
programme.desc: Can a family from North Yorkshire run a business in the middle of Europe’s only desert? A car enthusiast pushes to sell spares in France. Two expats launch a dive centre in Marbella.

programme.title: BARCELONA and BERLIN
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Travel in Style S1 - "BARCELONA and BERLIN"
programme.desc: Barcelona, an architectural delight, with real European Style. If you’re looking for an alternative to sun, sea and sand then the urban city of Berlin is the perfect travel destination for you!

programme.title: CYPRUS and IBIZA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Travel in Style S1 - "CYPRUS and IBIZA"
programme.desc: Mediterranean, Mythology, and Fusion - These are just a few things that Cyprus can offer! Ibiza is undoubtedly one of the most stunning Islands in the Mediterranean.

programme.title: JOHANNESBURG and BOTSWANA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Travel in Style S1 - "JOHANNESBURG and BOTSWANA"
programme.desc: In Johannesburg our crew stayed in style in the luxurious Westcliff Hotel. In Botswana, we visit three remarkable Safari camps.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 1"
programme.desc: Join Chef Sara Aqel as she explores Jordan’s northern produce, landscapes, and historical sights before hosting an idyllic dinner at Amman’s Citadel.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 2"
programme.desc: Join Chef Ali Ghzawi as he takes us on a journey through Jordans southern sights of Petra, Aqaba, and Wadi Rum, using the best local produce, for a dinner at the Dead Sea.

programme.title: Fun House
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent S4 - "Fun House"
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They’re looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl’s got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Family Home
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent S5 - "Family Home"
programme.desc: Vipin Kakkars a successful businessman and his family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the GTA. Real Estate Agents Debbie Domingues and Mike Donia are challenged to find the perfect home that caters everyones needs.

programme.title: House of Dreams
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent S5 - "House of Dreams"
programme.desc: Phil and Claire, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore. Mortgage Broker, Paul Meredith advises in the investment options for the couple, as well as possibilities for amortgage.

programme.title: Dive into Marbella
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Dive into Marbella"
programme.desc: Can a family from North Yorkshire run a business in the middle of Europe’s only desert? A car enthusiast pushes to sell spares in France. Two expats launch a dive centre in Marbella.

programme.title: Mauritius Part 1
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Mauritius Part 1"
programme.desc: East Africa beckons and Sashi is answering the call. Sashi is bouncing around the island nation to discover its culinary curiosities; from streetfood to haute cuisine, and everything else in between!

programme.title: Mauritius Part 2
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Mauritius Part 2"
programme.desc: East Africa beckons and Sashi is answering the call. Sashi is bouncing around the island nation to discover its culinary curiosities; from streetfood to haute cuisine, and everything else in between!

programme.title: Bali
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 A Simple Path S2 - "Bali"
programme.desc: Bali, the paradise island of magic. Its about progression at Motion Skate Park, DIY at the Jungle spot, vegan indulgence at Kynd cafe, design for the Hand of God, hot bowl grinds at the Dog Bowl and Loco by Nature and Televisi Star worldwide.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kylman saan saapuessa aikaisin ja velkojen kasaantuessa miehisto tyontaa, vetaa ja raahaa mammuttimaisen ja mahdollisesti kauden pelastavan lohkareen leirille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivoksesta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivokselta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Elokuun hurjan lumimyrskyn takia Claudian ja Robinin on pakko jaada 2 Mileen, kun taas Gary ja Garon yrittavat pelastaa tilanteen ajamalla myrskyn lapi ja tuomalla heille tarvikkeita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin tekee vaikean paatoksen rakkaan kaivosautonsa Six packin suhteen toisen kalliiksi tulleen rikkoutumisen jalkeen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Talven lahestyessa Claudia ajaa uupuneen miehistonsa murtumispisteeseen, mika saa kiihkon leimahtamaan ja pakottaa Claudian viimein hyvaksymaan tappionsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Uusi kaivoskausi on taynna ikavia yllatyksia, mutta epatodennakoinen tapahtuma pelastaa tilanteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh on kyllastynyt tyoskentelemaan isalleen, joten han perustaa oman kuorma-autoyrityksensa uudella rekalla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Armeijan kuorma-auto hajoaa julmalla tiella kaivokselle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Gary ja poikansa pelastavat vanhan armeijan kuorma-auton, mutta sen ajaminen kaivokselle on raakaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Garon ja Josh menettavat Six packin hallinnan mutaisilla teilla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Justin lentaa paikalle uuden vaijerisahan kanssa, mutta menettaa malttinsa yrittaessaan asentaa sita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto kohtaa loputtomasti ongelmia yrittaessaan leikata palan 18 metrin pituisesta linssista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia tuo paikalle ison porauskaluston, ja hanella on vain nelja paivaa aikaa loytaa paras jadepaikka, mutta han ja Robin eivat osaa paattaa, mista etsia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehet ottavat yhteen, kun he loppukauden kiireet pakottavat heidat tyoskentelemaan kahdessa kaivoksessa yhta aikaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto irrottaa jadelohkareita J-linssista, mutta iso ongelma tiella uhkaa kaikkea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Claudia ja Robini etsivat jadea poraamalla tuloksetta, edes yhtion geologit eivat paase yksimielisyyteen suunnitelmasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada raskaan kaluston vuorelle ennen kuin tulvivat joet katkaisevat paasyn kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Ilmassa on jannitetta, kun miehisto yrittaa saada raskasta kalustoa mutaiselle, lohkareiden peittamalle 120 kilometrin pituiselle polulle perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksen vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa saada koneensa kulkemaan vyoryvien jokien yli perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksensa vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan on vakuuttunut siita, etta Dynastyn alueella veden tayttaman kuopan alla on jadea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin yrittaa uhmata fysiikan lakeja saadakseen massiivisen uuden kasarmin Wolverinen alueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn porukkaa koettelee huono onni, ja jokainen keksii ainutlaatuisia ratkaisuja huonon onnen karkottamiseksi.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaikki innostuvat, kun he vihdoin alkavat kaivaa esiin lupaavia vihreita lohkareita, joiden miehisto uskoo olevan miljoonien arvoisia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun ulkomaiset sijoittajat piipahtavat yllattaen tarkistamaan Wolverinen kaivosalueen toita, ja Alan yrittaa rauhoittaa tilannetta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Wolverinen kaivoksella vihdoin loydetaan lupaavia lohkareita, miehisto huomaa, etta he ovat saattaneet menna tonttinsa rajojen ulkopuolelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn kaivostyolaiset yrittavat loytaa rikkauksia - tarpeeksi suuren jadelohkareen, joka tekee vaikutuksen sijoittajiin - ennen kauden paattymista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian ja Robinin testaamattomat koneet alkavat hajota raaalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa ylittaa tulvivia jokia matkalla kaivokselle koneet mukanaan, mutta Josh jaa jalkeen ongelmallisen kaivinkoneen takia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaivoskausi alkaa, ja vaikka jadea ei nay, rekkaonnettomuus tuo Jade Citylle onnea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Guysta tulee Wolverinen johtaja, ja uuden tyontekijan palkkaaminen uhkaa suistaa hanen tehtavansa loytaa kauden ensimmainen jadelohkare.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Juuri kun Wolverinen miehisto tehostaa turvallisuusmenetelmiaan, uusi tyontekija Jay romahtaa, mika paljastaa heidan hatavalmiutensa sarot.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh kayttaa uutta kaivinkonetta, kun taas arvottomien kivien kasa saa Claudian harkitsemaan uutta strategiaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan tuo Jade Cityyn ostajaryhman, mika saa Claudian tiimin paniikkiin ja etsimaan kauden ensimmaiset myytavat jadelohkareet.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun miehisto rampii mudassa etsiessaan miljoonan dollarin arvoista lohkaretta, Josh riskeeraa puolen miljoonan dollarin arvoisen kaluston yrittaessaan vetaa rekkaansa pois vajoamasta.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman is placed in a restraint chair. A troubled woman with a drug addiction is brought in on prostitution charges. One man is taken to a sobering cell to sleep off his intoxication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A disorderly man shouts to the heavens and asks for divine intervention. Twin brothers are arrested after a fray with police. A man in women’s clothing is booked after harassing passengers on a bus.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail
