programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: Paallepain ymparistokonsultti Adamilla, yksityisyrittaja Mikella ja ensiapulaakari Neililla ei ole mitaan yhteista, mutta he kaikki ovat mukana 12 askeleen ohjelmassa kohti vapautta riippuvuuksistaan. Adam ei uskalla heittaytya uuteen rakkauteen, Mike yrittaa raivokkaasti kontrolloida perhettaan eika Danny suostu myontamaan ongelmiaan, mutta haasteet ja pienet askeleet yhdistaa miehet perheeksi, joka kannustaa, raivostuttaa ja kiittaa toisiaan matkalla uuteen elamaan.

programme.title: Kuuhullut (Moonstruck)
programme.desc: Tassa klassisessa romanttisessa komediassa Brooklynin leski (Cher) on valmis menemaan uudelleen naimisiin. Talla kertaa han aikoo tehda sen oikein, vaikka joutuisikin sanomaan ”kylla” miehelle, jota han ei oikeasti rakasta. Mutta kun han rakastuu sulhasensa veljeen (Nicolas Cage), seuraa romanttinen mutka, joka on arvoinen suurimpia koomisia oopperoita! Olympia Dukakis on myos mukana.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube, Anthony Anderson, Sean Patrick Thomas, Eve ja Cedric the Entertainer tahdittavat tata hervotonta komediaa Chicagon parturiliikkeesta, jossa terava huumori ei koskaan mene pois muodista! Calvin (Ice Cube) on yrittajaksi pyrkiva nuori mies suurilla suunnitelmilla... eika perheen parturiliikkeen pyorittaminen kuulu niihin. Mutta kun han myy impulsiivisesti liikkeen epailyttavalle lainanantajalle, han tajuaa pian, kuinka tarkea naapuruston parturi on hanelle... ja kuinka pitkalle han on valmis menemaan saadakseen sen takaisin!

programme.title: Off the Rails
programme.desc: Kolme viisikymppista naista haluaa toistaa nuoruutensa Interrail-seikkailut Euroopassa sen jalkeen kun heidan laheinen ystavansa kuolee ja jattaa heille junaliput seka viimeisen toivomuksen: heidan pitaa ottaa naisen tytar mukaan. Talla kertaa matkustelu ympari Eurooppaa osoittautuu vaikeaksi heille, kun kadonneet passit, junalakot ja odottamattomat romanttiset suhteet sekoittavat heidan ystavyyssuhteensa. Kysymys kuuluukin: ehtivatko he ajoissa kunnioittamaan ystavansa muistoa?

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: Majava
programme.desc: Majavasta voi olla apua sinullekin! Walter Blackin huumori on yhta mustaa kuin hanen sukunimensa. Toissa menee huonosti, vaimo on saanut tarpeekseen ja poika vihaa isaansa. Masennuksen syovereissa - ja kesken itsetuhoisen ryyppyputken - Walter loytaa roskasailiosta nuhruisen kasinuken. Majavan. Kangasnukke kadessaan Walter voi jalleen puhua vapaasti. Ja vielapa brittiaksentilla! Mutta samalla kun Walter loytaa itsensa uudelleen, uusi majavapersoona saa hanesta yliotteen! Kaksinkertaiset Oscar-voittajat Mel Gibson ja Jodie Foster ovat tehneet palkitun kasikirjoituksen avulla yhden vuoden omaperaisimmista elokuvahelmista.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: Karannutta vankia jahtaava agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) lahtee suorittamaan peitetehtavaa ja pukeutuu maarailevaksi ja isokokoiseksi mummoksi, joka mottaa yhta kovaa kuin komentaakin.

programme.title: Wagons East
programme.desc: He tulivat hakemaan kultaa, mutta he tyytyivat mielellaan hyvaan viemarijarjestelmaan.John Candy ja Richard Lewis tahdittavat epatyypillista lankkaria.

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) on tavallinen tytto, josta tulee vahingossa prinsessa, kun perheen kesamatka Pariisiin muuttuu elaman laajuiseksi fantasiaksi. Grace, joka elaa kuin kuninkaallinen kahden parhaan ystavansa kanssa, huomaa, kuka han todella on – omaksumalla toisen henkilon identiteetin.

programme.title: Wheres The Money
programme.desc: South Los Angelesista kotoisin oleva nuori ja terava Del saa tietaa, etta hanen vankilassa istuva isansa ja juuri telkien takaa vapautunut setansa ovat varastaneet miljoona dollaria, jotka ovat katkettyina eraan vanhan rakennuksen kellarissa. On vain yksi pieni ongelma: arvostettu yliopisto on levittaytynyt naapurustoon, ja vanha yomaja on askettain keskiluokkaistunut valkoisten opiskelijoiden veljeskuntatalo.

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Toimittaja tutkii murhasarjaa, joka tunnetaan nimella Spring break massacre ja se vie sekasorron viela pidemmalle tassa slasher-elokuvien parodiassa.

programme.title: Come to Daddy
programme.desc: Kun Norval saa odottamatta kirjeen vieraantuneelta isaltaan, han matkustaa isan syrjaiselle rantatalolle. Mutta hyvin pian han huomaa omituisen tunnelman, ja kaivatusta jalleentapaamisesta muodostuu helvetillinen painajainen.

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: The Female Brain
programme.desc: Mika saa naisen swaippaamaan oikeaan herra Vaaran ja vasempaan herra Oikean kohdalla? Sofia Vergara ja Whitney Cummings tahdittavat elokuvaa, joka kertoo ihan oikeasta tieteesta (usein kaduttavien) romanttisten impulssiemme takana. Suoraviivainen neurologi Julia tutkii miesten ja naisten aivojen eroja, jotka esitellaan kolmen eri suhteen vaiheessa olevan pariskunnan elaman kautta. Julian jamerat oletukset joutuvat kuitenkin koetukselle, kun tutkimuksiin osallistuu uusi nuori komistus...

programme.title: Joe - jokapaikan hoyla
programme.desc: Tim Allenin esittama Joe on mies, jonka elama on muuttunut vakaasti aina vain surkeammaksi. Kun toimiston kiusaaja menee liian pitkalle, Joe paattaa vihdoin muuttua mitattomyydesta joksikin paremmaksi.

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: Sinun, minun ja meidan (Yours, Mine and Ours)
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid ja Rene Russo tahdittavat tata ihastuttavaa uudelleenfilmatisointia vuoden 1968 samannimisesta elokuvasta. Leskeksi jaanyt rannikkovartioston amiraali ja leskeksi jaanyt kasilaukkujen suunnittelija rakastuvat ja menevat naimisiin, mika aiheuttaa suurta harmia hanen 10 ja hanen 8 lapselleen. Lasten juonitellessa vanhempiensa erottamiseksi he tajuavat, etta tarkeinta on perhe.

programme.title: Pete Smalls Is Dead
programme.desc: Hollywoodin taakseen jattanyt kasikirjoittaja joutuu palaamaan unelmien kaupunkiin ohjaajaystavansa kuoltua.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: Kun lahetti toimittaa vahingossa katkettyja kokaiinitiilia sisaltavan paketin vaaraan osoitteeseen, han kaynnistaa tapahtumasarjan, jossa kokaiinia etsivat ja siita taistelevat epatoivoisesti sen lahettanyt raivostunut diileri, peloissaan olevat vastaanottajat, joille lahetys oli menossa ja paketin vahingossa vastaanottaneet henkilot, jotka aikovat varastaa sen.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: Wheres The Money
programme.desc: South Los Angelesista kotoisin oleva nuori ja terava Del saa tietaa, etta hanen vankilassa istuva isansa ja juuri telkien takaa vapautunut setansa ovat varastaneet miljoona dollaria, jotka ovat katkettyina eraan vanhan rakennuksen kellarissa. On vain yksi pieni ongelma: arvostettu yliopisto on levittaytynyt naapurustoon, ja vanha yomaja on askettain keskiluokkaistunut valkoisten opiskelijoiden veljeskuntatalo.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: Karannutta vankia jahtaava agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) lahtee suorittamaan peitetehtavaa ja pukeutuu maarailevaksi ja isokokoiseksi mummoksi, joka mottaa yhta kovaa kuin komentaakin.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.title: Ghost Town Gold [The Three Mesquiteers]
programme.desc: CAVALIERS OF THE CACTUS COUNTRY--ALWAYS READY FOR A FIGHT OR A FROLICK! The second entry in what would grow into a wildly popular series of Western Three Mesquiteers B-Movies produced by Republic Pictures, Ghost Town Gold tracks the titular trio as they attempt to recover the gold stolen by a gang in its effort to ruin the bank/mayor who ordered them to leave town. Frequent John Wayne collaborator Joseph Kane adds his signature directorial panache to this rousing shoot-em-up, setting the tone for a film series that was so rampantly successful, it spawned 50 sequels and a host of imitators from rival studios.

programme.title: Idaho
programme.desc: Western icon Roy Rogers, along with his trusty companion Trigger, are back for another adventure. This time, a respected judge is being framed for murder by a crooked saloon owner. Always the valiant champion, Rogers vows to clear the name of the judge and find the truth all while courting a lovely beau. Cellist turned editor turned Republic Pictures workhorse Joseph Kane takes the reins of this rousing, musical adventure, which features a number of original songs performed by Rogers himself, with the help of singer-songwriter Bob Nolan and character actor Smiley Burnette (TVs Petticoat Junction).

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: Its the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: The Gunman from Bodie
programme.desc: The Rough Riders, a popular group that thrilled audiences in the early 1940s, are after a gang of rustlers in this B-western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Starring Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, and Raymond Hatton, this movie features everything from lawmen going undercover to the Rough Riders looking after an orphaned baby! Also, be on the lookout for the beautiful Christine McIntyre, who would go on to appear in several of the Three Stooges shorts for Colombia Pictures.

programme.title: Young Bill Hickock
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars as the title character in this actionpacked feature from Republic Pictures. Starring Sally Payne as Calamity Jane, and Rogerss ongoing sidekick George Gabby Hayes, this twofisted saga relives some of Americas most colorful days, and also has time for a few musical numbers, including Up and Down the Prairie, and When the Shadows Fall Across the Rockies.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tagg Oakley finds himself in trouble after being tricked into driving a wagon full of gunpowder to Fort Yuma, unaware that Geronimo and his Apache braves are waiting for the wagon to pass. Realizing Tagg is in danger, Annie and Lofty race to the rescue. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie writes to the son of an old female pedlar, unaware that he is a member of an outlaw gang, now on their way to Diablo. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Slim Pickens. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 The Saga of Clement O Toole
programme.desc: Mistaken for a notorious outlaw, a young man struggles to convince the townspeople that he didnt commit a stagecoach robbery. Initially, Annie and Susan Meriwether believe him, but his innocence comes into question when he is present during a bank robbery in which the outlaws seem to recognize him. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the sheriff off looking for an outlaw, a fake sheriff takes his place, leading to a senseless murder. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This enetertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Waiting to hear whether or not gold has been struck in the mine, Annie discovers a beloved stagecoach is being driven by the daughter of the owner, whos threatening to sell the stage so he can pocket the money. When word comes back that there is no gold in the money, Annie becomes suspicious and begins investigating. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Annie Calls Her Shots
programme.desc: After a jailed Dobie escapes from jail, Dobie and Tagg find themselves kidnapped, forcing a desperate Annie to rescue her brother. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her fathers killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After raising money for charity with a circus sideshow, Annie and Tagg are robbed of their money by a man named the Welshman. Annie and Lofty set up a trap with one last performance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Annie Makes a Marriage
programme.desc: Annie tries to help an ex-convict prove his innocence so that he can be with the woman he loves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho break a woman out of prison before she is hanged for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog.. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A town blames the son-in-law of a the bank president for his murder. Cisco and Pancho work to uncover the truth before the townspeople hang the man. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: After arriving in the town of Sundance, Cisco witnesses the destruction of a newspaper office. Upon seeing this, Cisco contends with the man trying to take over the town. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951

programme.title: Cisco Kid

This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A man confesses to a murder he did not commit in order to pay for his mothers surgery. Cisco and Pancho work to prove his innocence. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho aid a poor man who gets caught up in a cattle rustling operation. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco heads to the town of Twin Buttes and finds a haven for criminals. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 . This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Pancho is taken hostage by a bank robbers sister.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. . The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to clear the name of a man who is accused of robbing freights in order to force a womans freighting company out of business. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: Hurricane Horseman
programme.desc: Pancho Gomez kidnaps Don Roberto and his daughter, Tonita for ransom. Can an undercover lawman named Gun Smith save the pair, or will he be caught himself?! Smith gets a job in Gomezs camp supposedly to repair their guns. Instead he fixes the guns so they will misfire. When Gomez refuses to let him go, he sends his horse for the Sheriff! This campy western from 1931 stars Lane Chandler and is sure to keep you enthralled from beginning to end. Directed by Armand Schaefer; starring Marie Quillan and Walter Miller.

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. Youll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Waynes big swinging right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Waynes...

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother battles brother in this gritty tale of feuding ranchers in the old west. This story of the Texas panhandle stars such familiar faces as Robert Preston, Chill Wills, and Jack Elam, and was a rare film for its time in that it was filmed almost entirely in Texas with no studio interiors. If for no other reason, watch this one for Prestons performance. If you only know him from The Music Man or Victor Victoria, youre sure to be surprised here! (also, look for John Drew Barrymore as Jef Cloud. He was part of the famous Barrymore family, and father of Drew Barrymore.) Jim Strake: Frank Cordell. The Whip: Dave Kashner. Directed by George Templeton

programme.title: Hoppy Serves a Writ
programme.desc: Sheriff Hopalong Cassidy triumphs again in this lighthearted western romp from Harry Sherman Productions. Good ol Hoppy (William Boyd) has to leave his beloved Texas to track down some bad guys in Oklahoma. You can bet that the action and suspense will follow Hopalong wherever he goes. Also, look for a number of familiar faces in the ast, including TVs future Superman George Reeves, notorious Hollywood heavy Victor Jory, and in his first credited role, Robert Mitchum! In fact, Mitchum would appear in more of Hoppys adventures before branching out on his own and becoming one of Hollywoods greatest stars. Also featuring Jan Christy, Forbes Murray, Byron Foulger, Earle Hodgins, and Roy...

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: A love story and a search for gold in the Valley of Death! Dubbed simple, powerful and dramatic by the New York Times on the date of its release, Death Valley is indeed an elegant depiction of love and deception in the American desert during the Gold Rush. In what was to be the final film of famed silent film director Paul Powell (Polyanna), a cast of mostly unknown actors produces uniformly excellent work. Lyrical and graceful, Powells film spins the tale of a young boy who finds love and gold, only to have it stolen from him.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: Ridin the Lone Trail
programme.desc: Sam Newfield directs this Western about a group of outlaws who are robbing stagecoaches while being led by a mysterious outlaw on a beautiful white horse. Bob McArthur (Bob Steele) arrives to help and makes a shocking discovery when he follows the white horse to the outlaws hideout. This B-Western, one of a long line of Sam Newfield efforts, also stars Claire Rochelle and Charles King (who has over 400 acting credits to his name, beginning with The Birth of a Nation in 1915 and ending in 1957 (his death)!

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Hit the Saddle
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers get involved when a local sheriff is killed in this B-western from Republic Pictures. The trouble starts when a villainous rancher (J.P. McGowan) plots to steal some government protected horses. Bob Livingstone, Max Terhune, and Ray Corrigan star as the gallant Mesquiteers, while a young Rita Hayworth (Gilda, The Lady From Shanghai) appears as a sexy saloon singer who turns a Mesquiteers head.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In General Delivery, the G-men crack a government swindle. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In Gypsy Traders, a band of gypsies settles down in the Montana Territory to take advantage of the copper stakes theyve made in the region. In the nearby town of Bender, a group of shady locals believe the settlers should be stripped of their rights and take the matter to court. When it looks like the judge is going to rule for the gypsies, the outlaws kidnap him and lock him in the local jail.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kates intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is found murdered after he threatens to disinherit his niece. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Following their activity with the Quantrill Raiders, the Younger Brothers return on the scene to commit a bank robbery in Minnesota. Detectives Matt and Frankie work to put a stop to their plan. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, George Wallace, Gregory Walcott, Louise Beavers, and Sheb Wooley. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode originally aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: The notorious John Wesley Hardin kills two people while on a cattle drive to Abilene. Matt and Frankie head out to bring him to justice. Richard Webb stars as John Wesley Hardin. Also starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Howard Negley, Robert Karnes amd John Eldredge. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired April 9, 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge deals with a rigged election. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: A young boy runs away from home because he thinks his father is a coward for not standing up to his abusive boss. Jeff and Roy have to find the boy and convince him that his father is just doing what he has to do in order to provide for his family. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Sam is framed by Duke and his gang, who have kidnapped Linda to prevent Sam from proving his innocence. Its up to Annie and Lofty to save Sam from an angry mob, save Linda from Duke and his gang, and take them down for their crimes. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annies younger brother finds himself in danger when he gets in trouble with The Shadow Gang after running away with a friend. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Since the arrival of a Lt. Smith, members of the Iroquois tribe keep turning up dead. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired December 25, 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye learns that his brother has joined the British army and is now a redcoat. However, when he is murdered by a treacherous Indian companion, Hawkeye seeks revenge. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe Cartwright tries to help a gypsy girl who was abandoned by her people - because they believed she was a werewolf.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Wagon Wheels
programme.desc: Randolph Scott (Ride the High Country) stars as Clint Belmet, the leader of a wagon train on the way to Oregon. Along the route he and his crew deal with various hardships, including Indian attacks and a fellow named Murdock (Monte Blue) who is out to stop them at any cost. With a cast that includes the likes of Gail Patrick and Billy Lee, this adventure saga was based on a novel by the western master, Zane Grey (Riders of the Purple Sage, Fighting Caravans). Trivia note: The films original title was Caravans West.

programme.title: Wildfire: The Story of a Horse
programme.desc: Fanning (John Miljan) has his men rustle horses and then blame it on a wild horse named Wildfire. Happy and Alkali arrive and immediately get into trouble with Fanning and his men. When Alkali is shot, Happy catches the outlaws but the Judge not only releases them, he discharges the Sheriff and tries to arrest Happy for rustling! Starring Bob Steele and Sterling Holloway, directed by Robert Emmett Tansey. 1945 (Color).

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada Jones, a feisty young woman, attempts to stake her claim in the cattle business despite threats from greedy land grabbers and their hired killers.

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: Desperadoes of the West
programme.desc: A group of ranchers, led by Colonel Arnold and Ward Gordon, are drilling an oil well but getting fierce opposition from an unknown gang of outlaws. Eastern promoter J.B. Dude Dawson is behind the gang as he is out to prevent the co-op members from striking oil before their lease expires, so he can secure the property for his company. When Ward, with the help of Arnold and his daughter Sally, arranges for a new driller to be brought in, the replacement man is killed and one of Dawsons men takes his place.

programme.title: Porsche Cayman GT4
programme.desc: The Porsche Cayman GT4 is lighter, more powerful and faster than previous models; Porsche demonstrates its capabilities for achieving fast lap times.

programme.title: FIM EnduroGP World Championship
programme.desc: The first round of the 2024 EnduroGP is the GP of Portugal, taking place in Fafe.

programme.title: FIM EnduroGP World Championship
programme.desc: The teams and drivers again gather in Portugal for Round 2 of the 2024 EnduroGP, this time in Valpacos.

programme.title: FIM EnduroGP World Championship
programme.desc: Round 3 takes the competitors in the 2024 EnduroGP to Romania, to the town of Bacau.

programme.title: FIM EnduroGP World Championship
programme.desc: Its Round 4 of the 2024 EnduroGP, and stakes are high in Bettola, Italy.

programme.title: FIM EnduroGP World Championship
programme.desc: The fifth round of the 2024 EnduroGP is the GP of Slovakia in Gelnica.

programme.title: FIM EnduroGP World Championship
programme.desc: The town of Rhayader in Wales hosts the sixth round of the 2024 EnduroGP.

programme.title: FIM EnduroGP World Championship
programme.desc: The competing teams make their way to Rioude in France for Round 7 of the 2024 EnduroGP.

programme.title: Rolls-Royce Wraith
programme.desc: The Rolls Royce Wraith is different. It gives the traditional British brand a whole new dynamic.

programme.title: Rolls-Royce Dawn Convertible
programme.desc: Almost silently, it glides through the night; in front of the driver, 12 smoothly running cylinders are at work, with a power reserve that seems inexhaustible; the Rolls Royce Dawn is a convertible for connoisseurs.

programme.title: NASCAR Whelen Euro
programme.desc: In the 2025 season, Motorvision broadcasts all ENPRO class races live.

programme.title: Ignition GT
programme.desc: Ziphorah heads for the outdoors in the Haval H7; BMW unveils the fourth generation X3 and Juliet drives the MINI Cooper.

programme.title: Buyers Guide
programme.desc: We search for a family vehicle under R150,000; pickup trucks from Mazda, Isuzu, Mitsubishi and GWM go head-to-head and we find out whether it is advisable to remap an engine.

programme.title: IGNITION Goes to SEMA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E103 IGNITION Goes to SEMA
programme.desc: Vic examines two very different takes on the BMW M4, a racer for the road and one thats meant to carry a load; he discovers a VW Beach Buggy thats been customised by Chip Foose.

programme.title: Petrol Heads
programme.desc: Sbu receives his very first driving lesson in a truck; we meet car enthusiasts; our second Drag Kings hopeful lines up on the strip.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Being one step ahead of time has always been a bit pricier. But is the new BMW i8 just an luxurious, avant-garde carrier of technology or can it already be considered as a serious sports car? Why should you pay double the price compared to the BMW.

programme.title: Super Cars
programme.desc: Exploring the luxury, speed, and high-tech power of the fastest and finest cars in the world; the workmanship, the highest level of engineering, and the most expensive price are the deciding factors for the winner of the Supercar Title.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: These days theres hardly a car manufacturer who doesnt build any kind of SUV. Three of the sportiest SUVs on the market are the Porsche Macan Turbo, Mercedes GLA 45 AMG and Audi RSQ3. Each of them comes with more than 300 HP.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Porsche Panamera Turbo S is the most dynamic sedan in the world. No other car finds the perfect balance between calm gliding on the one hand and extreme performance on the other hand.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Supercars drives the new LS 600h, the BMW Actiev Hybrid 7, and the Porsche Panamera S E-Hybrid. Luxury does not necessarily mean to waste time.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Slivretta Hochalpenstrasse in Austria is the ideal playground for the Lotus Elise and the Roding Roadster.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Most people associate Aston Martin with James Bond, luxury, style, and elegance. The Vantage N430 is a sports car that makes you feel the heritage of British race cars. It is elegant, fast, comes with a marvelous sound.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Mercedes presents its first plug-in hybrid car with the S500. With an electric range of 33 kilometers, a declared average consumption of 2.8 liters, and a system output of 442 horses the S500 is the most efficient luxury car on the market.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: Italian supercars are some of the most exciting cars in the world; from Ferrari, Lamborghini Aventador or the Pagani Huayra, they are the most beautiful and the fastest cars in the world.

programme.title: Porsche Cayman GT4
programme.desc: The Porsche Cayman GT4 is lighter, more powerful and faster than previous models; Porsche demonstrates its capabilities for achieving fast lap times.

programme.title: Land Rover Experience Tour
programme.desc: Every other year, the Land Rover Experience Tour invites adventurers to explore the worlds most remote areas. In 2017, its time for next tour. The destination: Peru. 30,000 people applied, but only six of them qualified.

programme.title: Land Rover Experience Tour
programme.desc: Every other year, the Land Rover Experience Tour invites adventurers to explore the worlds most remote areas. In 2017, its time for next tour. The destination: Peru. 30,000 people applied, but only six of them qualified.

programme.title: Land Rover Experience Tour
programme.desc: Every other year, the Land Rover Experience Tour invites adventurers to explore the worlds most remote areas. In 2017, its time for next tour. The destination: Peru. 30,000 people applied, but only six of them qualified.

programme.title: Land Rover Experience Tour
programme.desc: Every other year, the Land Rover Experience Tour invites adventurers to explore the worlds most remote areas. In 2017, its time for next tour. The destination: Peru. 30,000 people applied, but only six of them qualified.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A cruise over the Alps to Italy in a Maserati GranCabrio MC. In addition, a look at the Jaguar XK-RS convertible with 550 hp and the uncompromising performance of Mercedes-AMGs SL models.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: In a city that loves to show off wealth and luxury, the Dubai police are eager to represent this image via its fleet of patrol cars that includes a Chevrolet Camaro, Lamborghini Aventador, Bentley GT, Ferrari FF, and Mercedes SLS.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Aerodynamics influence the performance, track stability and dynamics of a vehicle. Takes a look at the Porsche 911 Turbo S, the BMW M6 convertible and the Kelleners 330d in order to explore the influence of different wings and spoilers.

programme.title: Audi R8 V10 Plus
programme.desc: The second generation of the Audi R8; V10 naturally aspirated engine, up to 610 horsepower and 330 kilometers an hour; a supercar with a lot of character.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: MotorStories

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: German entrepreneur Tillmann Miritz loves vintage cars and has one dream: A trip through the USA with his Mercedes Cabriolet 280 SE 3.5. But before he can make his dream come true, he needs to get his car across the French Riviera.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Tillmann starts his dream journey in New York, the city that never sleeps; with his Mercedes 280 SE convertible he visits the legendary classic car dealer Eliot Cuker who made his fortune with his passion for old cars.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Following the progress of driver Uwe Nittle, as he gets ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: A look at the RCN Challenge: The BMW Driving Experience and the Devils Diner.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Now that the 24-hour race is over we have left the Nuerburgring and moved to Bueren, Germany, where Raeder Sport is based. Famous for really fast front-wheel drives, it provides a lot of horsepower down on the track.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: The track at Nuerburgring is used for bike riding and running.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb of 1987: A different type of race in the mountains of Colorado, USA.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: Since 1934, the Grand Prix has been the most exciting and fascinating world championship in the world. With its state-of-the-art vehicles, with horsepower from the biggest brands, it never fails to wow its viewers.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The International Championship for Manufacturers was a rally series which ran from 1970 - 1972.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL lightweight on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Paul has to slide underneath an exploding vehicle, while Anna is catapulted in the air.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: One stuntman has to go head over heels in his car, while two colleagues combine a car chase with a fistfight.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Stuntmen operate an Artega GT at full speed with a remote control.

programme.title: Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur
programme.desc: Flowing lines and an elegance that is unmatched; the 1959 Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur aims to build bridges in the companys model range; from the sporty origin of the brand to the luxury of its new owner, Rolls Royce.

programme.title: 2025 FIM X-Trial World Championship
programme.desc: This series features riders utilizing the most technical riding skills on the planet as they navigate nearly impossible obstacles in the ultimate test of technique, balance, creativity, and commitment.

programme.desc: Mr Bean runs rings around the town.

programme.title: Love You to Death
programme.desc: A prosecutor must work on a case which reminds her of her childhood, when her mother was killed by her alcoholic father.

programme.title: Episode 17 - The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Henry’s old flame, Christina, is back and in need of his help. Vicki wonders if she has ulterior motives.

programme.title: Ice Girls
programme.desc: A figure skater is injured during a competition. A coach that hired her then helps her rehab her injury so that she may live her dream.

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: A woman interprets a kiss at a high school reunion as an invitation to follow her ex across the country and supplant his current family.

programme.title: Intimate Stranger
programme.desc: Karen, the beautiful single mother of precious 9-year-old Justin, never really had much luck with love. This all seems to change when she falls for her “Prince Charming”, Dennis, who is both a caring gentleman and a great friend to her son. But her perfect world begins to crumble when she finds a black rose on her doorstep, hears noises in the attic and gets prank calls in the middle of the night. After breaking up with Dennis her life begins to turn upside down and strange things start happening. Questioning her own sanity and left alone by authorities, friends and family, she decides to take matters into her own hands- a dangerous decision that puts her life on the line…

programme.title: It Had to be You
programme.desc: When her ad agency is absorbed by a much larger, more powerful firm, Darbys rivalry with new partner Derrick could blossom into something else.

programme.title: Offline
programme.desc: An online stalker torments a young woman.

programme.title: The Perfect Soulmate
programme.desc: A poet with an abusive husband reaches out to a fan for help, only to find an even more dangerous companion.

programme.title: The Psycho She Met Online
programme.desc: While her husband heals from a car crash, Karen bonds with their new renter—until another houseguest vanishes.

programme.title: InstaPsycho
programme.desc: When a selfie turns fatal, a woman must protect her teen daughter from a friend obsessed with social media.

programme.title: Lethal Beauty

programme.title: Made For You, With Love

programme.title: The Bad Son
programme.desc: An elusive serial killer is killing innocent women in Seattle. The police and FBI are on the killers trail but were never prepared to face a bizarre twist in the case.

programme.title: The Perfect Cheerleader
programme.desc: Cassies dream cheerleading squad takes a dark turn when a new man and a murder uncover a deadly conspiracy.

programme.title: Loves Sweet Recipe
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a talented chef and her childhood best friend as she regains her passion for cooking.

programme.title: Killer on the Island
programme.desc: On vacation with her husband, a woman suspects a local of multiple murders and fears shes next.

programme.title: Sweet Autumn

programme.title: Mommy Would Never Hurt You

programme.title: AMC Red Carpet - My Mother Is A Witch
programme.desc: AMC Red Carpet moments which brings you exclusive red carpet interviews with Nollywood stars at the premieres of top Nollywood movies and other industry events such as award ceremonies.

programme.title: The Awaken
programme.desc: An aspiring musician who hasnt had much luck or support catches a break when he perfomrs at the birthday party of an older woman. Things get complicated when it is discovered that she is his ex-girlfriends mother.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Sadiq returns from national service just in time to meet his family knee deep in debt and nearly homeless. Confused and desperate to save his family, he strikes a deal with a notorious drug ring that becomes more than he bargained for.

programme.title: The Cheerleaders
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Three lovely ladies form a group with one desire; stay away from love and use men only for their own selfish desires. However, two of them fall in love and create a crack in the group. The remaining one stays true to the creed of The Cheerleaders and stays off love and men. But love would eventually puncture through the tough wall she had built against it and she would come to find out one thing in the end; everybody can find true love.

programme.title: Boss Lady
programme.desc: What happens when a successful woman who runs her own business falls in love with her newly married employee? Is she willing to do what it takes to get what she wants? Or will life make it easier for her?

programme.title: Goodbye Yesterday
programme.desc: A man turns to his ex-lover for help when he finds out that his daughter needs life-saving surgery after falling ill.

programme.title: The Auction
programme.desc: Bamidele, a famous musician whose career is taking a downturn, finds unexpected love when he is put up for auction!

programme.title: Game Change
programme.desc: A group of four friends who just recently graduated sort out their quest for the big money by carrying out a ponzi scheme. The success of the first one urges them to carry out another one. But this time, nothing goes as planned.

programme.title: Love Like Chocolate
programme.desc: Amanda and Olisa are in a perfect relationship, but Amanda dreads the idea of getting married until her most coveted job is threatened.

programme.title: Blood and Rope
programme.desc: When 21-year-old Nnadubem becomes fascinated by the dambe traditional Hausa sport of bare- knuckle rope boxing. He has to convert a community of doubters and earn the respect of fellow fighters to be accepted as a warrior.

programme.title: Femi
programme.desc: Geneticist Femi Fernandez seeks the perfect male gene, inspired by the works of an enchanting painting, that makes her unexpectedly drawn to the artist to devastating consequences.

programme.title: We Did It For Love
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A desperate guy down on his luck deceitfully takes a loan from a loan shark to secure a future with his soul mate, a decision he soon regrets.

programme.title: Love Is Thicker
programme.desc: After Antonia had disapproved of all her twin brothers past girlfriends and also tried to set Lauretta up with him under conditions, Tony pops up with his actual girlfriend, who teaches her a hard-knock lesson.

programme.title: Like Theres No Tomorrow
programme.desc: Four friends come together for a sleep-over in celebration of their tenth-year graduation anniversary, however happy nostalgia, fun and games quickly morph into a race against time to save one of them, their host, a bubbly singer-songwriter with a weight on her shoulders, seems set to take her own life within twenty-four hours. Will a confession of long-held feelings, previously unrevealed for fears of ruining a great friendship, save her?

programme.title: She Sees
programme.desc: A blind woman grapples with the psychological trauma of being abused by a Dr meant to care for her but a chance meeting brings them together again but this time she see him for his crimes.

programme.title: Adùnní
programme.desc: Adunni struggles with the weight of a secret she carries, but when she finds out her secret isn’t limited to just her alone, she find the inner strength to seek justice and speak out.

programme.title: Composure
programme.desc: A marriage begins to suffer after the couple lose their unborn child. Things take a turn for the worse when the wife discovers her husband has been unfaithful and her mental health starts to spiral out of control.

programme.desc: MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.desc: Gifts perception of marriage is forever altered during her childhood after her father takes their maid as his second wife after 20years of marriage, breaking her mothers heart. This causes Gift to be distructful and when she gets married, she refuses to get a maid to help despite calls for it from her husband, Ubong.

programme.title: He Is Mine
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When his wife is kidnapped, Akin Richard’s life takes a terrible turn and he slips into depression. His revival and will to live comes from the love and affection from Sandra’s half-sister, Angela. After one year of mourning and sorrowing, they fall in love, and encouraged by the family, they get married. Akin is overjoyed until he receives a call that Sandra has been rescued alive; she is not dead after all.

programme.title: More Than a Friend
programme.desc: Simeon struggles in his romantic relationships due to his close friendship with his so-called business partner, Amanda.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: A family is left in disarray when Ada develops a crush on her sisters, Dorcas, husband, Mike. Things get out of hand when Ada decided to take action and get Mike by any means necessary.

programme.title: Officer No.7
programme.desc: When the only son of a middle-aged widow is killed by roadside policemen looking for a bribe, policemen begin to fall like flies with no known cause of death, leading the concerned dpo to invite the assistance of the crime investigation department who send in one of their foremost detectives as more bodies drop.

programme.desc: The biggest party songs and sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s and 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!

programme.title: Essential Albums of the 90s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Essential Albums of the 90s!
programme.desc: Mark Goodier with the decadess top 20 best selling albums - featuring 2 songs from each. Including iconic releases such as Urban Hymns, Jagged Little Pill, Stars and Abba Gold!

programme.title: The Weekend Hitlist
programme.desc: Every track a smash hit in the 90s or 00s, every video a UK chart number one. What more do you need for your weekend?

programme.title: Pat Sharps 00s Movie Monsters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharps 00s Movie Monsters
programme.desc: The 80s and 90s were the golden decades for movie songs - but there were still a few in the 00s - some well remembered, and some not! Pat Sharp has found 25 - grab that popcorn.

programme.title: Non-Stop 90s No.1s!
programme.desc: Every track a smash hit, every video a UK chart number one. What more could you possibly need in life?

programme.title: On The Stage and Silver Screen!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 On The Stage and Silver Screen!
programme.desc: From the stage and screen - 20 songs from musicals, in order. Expect lots of Elton John.

programme.title: Non-Stop 00s No.1s!
programme.desc: Every track a smash hit, every video a UK chart number one in the 00s. What more could you possibly need in life!

programme.title: 20 Million Sellers of the 90s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 20 Million Sellers of the 90s!
programme.desc: From Elton and Aqua to Celine and Cher - these all sold over a million in the 90s! But only one sold over 2 million - can you guess?

programme.title: Non-Stop 90s No.1s!
programme.desc: Every track a smash hit, every video a UK chart number one. What more could you possibly need in life?

programme.title: Toby Anstis: O-Zone Hits! Top 25
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Toby Anstis: O-Zone Hits! Top 25
programme.desc: If you were a fan of Tobys TV music show The O-Zone back in the day, then this will bring back memories. And hell throw in some stories of his encounters with the stars!

programme.title: Non-Stop 90s No.1s!
programme.desc: Every track a smash hit, every video a UK chart number one. What more could you possibly need in life?

programme.title: The United States Of Pop 1990-2009
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The United States Of Pop 1990-2009
programme.desc: Starting in 1990, two decades of the biggest songs from Americas US A list!

programme.title: Timmy Malletts Brilliant 90s!
programme.desc: Loud shirts, foam mallet and 25 huge videos of the decade are ready to go as Timmy Mallett brings us his Utterly Brilliant party!

programme.title: 5 Stages of a Break Up! Top 20
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 5 Stages of a Break Up! Top 20
programme.desc: Relive the highs and lows of lost love with our hand picked top 20 selection of heart-wrenching break up hits from the 00s.

programme.title: Mellow Moments!
programme.desc: Kick back and relax with some mellow moments. Chilled to perfection.

programme.title: Toby Anstis: O-Zone Hits! Top 25
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Toby Anstis: O-Zone Hits! Top 25

programme.title: The United States Of Pop 1990-2009

programme.title: Party Rock Anthems!
programme.desc: Party pop rock anthems spanning 5 decades! From Queen, Kiss and Aerosmith to Blur, Paramore and The White Stripes.

programme.title: 70s v 80s Rock Legends!
programme.desc: 30 hit songs, 15 top rock legends - one track as they were in the 70s, and another in the 80s - simple!

programme.title: 99 Reasons The 90s Rocked!
programme.desc: 99 anthems of rock from the decade that dominated the genre! With Aerosmith, Bon Jovi, Nirvana, Skunk Anansie, Meat Loaf and U2.

programme.title: No Intro Needed: The Top 50
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 No Intro Needed: The Top 50
programme.desc: 50 tracks we know you know - but how fast can you name them? One things for sure: after the first note, youll be singing them all night long!

programme.title: Heart and Soul: 50 Rock Ballads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Heart and Soul: 50 Rock Ballads
programme.desc: Carol Decker from TPau with 50 Rock Ballads written from the Heart and Soul! With Queen, Bon Jovi, The Cutting Crew and Bonnie Tyler.

programme.title: Sunday Rock Classics
programme.desc: Rounding off the week with rock classics and anthems! We guarantee AC/DC, Nirvana, Queen, Meat Loaf, Bon Jovi and much more!

programme.title: God Gave Rock and Roll To Us! Top 30
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 God Gave Rock and Roll To Us! Top 30
programme.desc: Guitars, big beats and a fantastic rhythm section - this is how we rocked out in the 90s! With Guns and Roses, Bon Jovi, Red Hot Chili Peppers and Brit Pop legends Pulp, Blur and Oasis.

programme.title: Weekend Rock Anthems
programme.desc: Your weekend anthems and the biggest rock songs from the last 50 years! From the Beatles and the Stones in the 60s right through to One Republic and Kings Of Leon in the 10s.

programme.title: Rock Top 3s: 2000-2009
programme.desc: in order, the rock anthems that claimed the top 3 in the first decade of this century. From Limp Bizkit in 2000 to Kasabian in 2009!

programme.title: Weekend Anthems!
programme.desc: Turn it up to 11 all weekend for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro and The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!

programme.title: Monsters of Rock! 1990-1999
programme.desc: A definitive 6 hour marathon of 90s guitar anthems! From U2 to INXS, Blur to Bon Jovi, Skunk Anansie to Green Day, Metallica to Iron Maiden - 70 rock classics are here, in order!
